title: The Day After: Chizuk
body: Mr. Shloime Werdiger offers chizuk to Yidden on the day after a contentious election, referencing the parshah's call to return to one's roots.

title: NYC Election Congrats
body: Agudath Israel of America congratulates NYC election winners, praising the Orthodox Jewish community's record turnout of hundreds of thousands, including many first-time registrants and voters.
